document.heading: Payment of Full Hotel Taxes by Online Vendors Clarification Act of 2010

history.narrative: Law 18-364, the “Payment of Full Hotel Taxes by Online Vendors Clarification Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-655, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 7, 2010, and December 21, 2010, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 27, 2011, it was assigned Act No. 18-715 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-364 became effective on April 8, 2011.
